output.sentences: The night before our outing the party was filled with all the freshmen students.
The next day went to a rollercoaster amusement park.
I really enjoyed riding the 20 feet rolled coaster.
My second favorite ride was the roller coaster that was made like a pretzel ball.
We went back to the hotel and discussed our exciting day.
